actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aid Highway Act of 1973 (P.L. 93-87), section 230(a) to require the use of not less than 5 percent of the funds to be appropriated for the Federal aid safer roads demonstration program for elimination of hazards at railroad-highway grade crossings.

summary.text: Requires, under the Federal Aid Highway Act the use of not less than 5 per cent of funds to be appropriated for the Federal-aid safer roads demonstration program for elimination of hazards at railroad-highway grade crossings.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aid Highway Act of 1973 (P.L. 93-87), section 230(a) to require the use of not less than 5 percent of the funds to be appropriated for the Federal aid safer roads demonstration program for elimination of hazards at railroad-highway grade crossings.
